properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 7:42PM PST until February 7 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Persistent snow to continue over parts of northeast Washington
and north Idaho...

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches.

* WHERE...Colville, Northport, Deer Park, Chewelah, Kettle
Falls, Springdale-Hunters Road, Orin-Rice Road, Flowery Trail
Road, Republic, Inchelium, Wauconda, Chesaw Road, Highway 20
Wauconda Summit, Boulder Creek Road, and Sherman Pass.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The difficult
driving conditions could impact travel, especially through the
evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST FRIDAY
